mapper.select: select to1.id,to1.address_start,to1.address_end,to1.rider_id,to1.user_id,to1.money,to1.status,to1.type,to1.notes,u.telephone from takeaway_order as to1 inner join user u on to1.user_id = u.id where to1.status = 0 and to1.user_id != #{userId}

select to2.id,to2.address_end,to2.address_start,to2.rider_id,to2.user_id,to2.money,to2.status,to2.type,to2.notes,u.telephone from takeaway_order to2 inner join user u on to2.user_id = u.id where rider_id = #{userId}
